summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of vacated Latona Avenue Northeast; Richmond Acre Addition; Section 28, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; S.W. Spokane Street; vacated Rainier Avenue South; Rainier Beach Addition; Section 1, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; Joseph S. Allen's Addition; Haller Lake Tracts; Government Lot 1; as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
